Row.Text: Greetings fellow warrior! I am Marshal Francisco Solano Lopez, president of Paraguay, your future overlords. I hope you grow accustomed to Jesuit missions.
Ah another leader comes to gaze upon the glory of Paraguay! I am Marshal Francisco Solano Lopez, president of this great nation.
My armies deafeated? My cities crumbled? I will die with my country rather than see its oppression.
Must you keep speaking?
Paraguay doesn't need your imports!
Paraguay is strong enough to handle itself. We're better off without this rubbish deal.
Are you offering deals you know I won't accept?
Back so soon? I mean I understand you admire the beauty of Paraguay, but these repeated trips are a little ridiculous.
You sure do like talking to me don't you?
For every word your speak, my soldiers will kill another one of your people.
And what do you want this time?
Greetings commander!
I hope your men remain disciplined my good marshal.
Always good to see you.
Good day.
What brings you here today?
Go on.
Let us begin.
Come to pledge fealty to your futute lord?
Paraguay will never falter! I will die with my country if necessary!
Paraguayans will never surrender! I've already changed the draft to include handicapped people and prepubescent children. Your armies will never win!
You won't make peace with me! Well maybe unless you try..
Shall we sign an armistice? Not a peace deal of course because this war will never truly end.
Paraguay has not been defeated! However, it shall accept a respite from active hostilities.
Your country will soon be overrun by my armies!
Peace is non-negotiable! Paraguay only signs deals in blood, your blood specifically.
I will never make peace with the likes of you. I rather melt down church bells if I had too to continue the fight. Hmm, that might not be a bad idea actually...
You dare betray my trust! You will be annihilated for this treachery!
Your are a valuable asset to Paraguay commander.
My men are on their way to the lands of {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey}. We don't really need your help, but you might as well send your troops anyway...
{1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} will be crushed under our collective forces!
Soon we'll have dealt with {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} once and for all.
Enjoy your time at war. It will not last long, I expect.
Slaughter your foes companion! I would help, but uh there's more pressing Paraguyan matters to attend to!
Your forces do not frighten my people.
If you bring your armies any closer I will assume treachery.
Those lands are rightfully Paraguayan! Stop this aggressive expansion immediately!
Your colonists are expandind far too near to my borders.
Oh so you think because you have some money you can just buy up all the land around Paraguay? You will pay for this...
Oh so you think because you have some money you can just buy up all the land around Paraguay? You will pay for this...
Your army is pathetic! Perhaps you soon start conscripting cripples, they'd be better than the filth you deploy on the frontlines.
Paraguay can carry on without you...
We do not need your assistance.
It would be undesirable to make such an arrangement with you.
Hah! You think your insults can cut deep into my? What a fool you are.
You seem like a worthy ally of Paraguay. Shall we join forces?
Your puny nation will never match the glory of Paraguay. You will be destroyed in time...[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
I accept your partnership.
We shall make a brilliant team you and I!
I must decline.
Sorry, but no. Perhaps another time.
I fear that such an arrangement is not in my best interests, so I must decline.
That sounds like a wise move. Let us take to the battlefield.
That is an intriguing offer. I accept. However, my empire is not yet prepared, so give me 10 turns. I will come to you again when I am ready.
Very well. I do what I must to maintain peace in my lands.
I will do what it takes to keep the peace.
Fine. But know that you poison your reputation with acts such as these. For what that might be worth to you.
Please. You're in no position to make such demands.
You should be well aware of your own inability to back those threats up.
You're not fooling anyone. I have nothing to fear from you.
Haha! You are not strong enough to make such demands of me.
You dare insult me in such a manner? If you want something so badly then do your best to come and take it.
You'll have to take it from my dead body.
If you want that you'll have to come and get it.
Unacceptable.
Don't be a fool.
You ask for too much. I will not drive my nation into poverty to satisfy your greed.
No. I have my dignity, and refuse to hand over such a great bounty so freely.
Your desire to strip my lands of so much wealth is intolerable. Do not ask for so much.
You threaten me again so soon? I refuse your demands, you vile beast.
Asking again so soon? You know that greed is a vice, great leader...
Asking for the fruits of others' labor yet again? Your greed is legendary. I will not give in to you.
Let's hear your offer.
What do you propose?
The time has come to end this war. What do you think of this arrangement?
There is no point in this conflict continuing any further. Let us return to peace.
We must not let war define who we are. The time has come to make peace.
You have something I want. If you don't hand it over quietly I'll have no choice but to take it by force.
Unfortunately things aren't going terribly well over here. Can you spare something for a friend? I'll try to return the favor when things are going better for me.
Although it pains me to do so, I must ask for your assistance, friend.
Your great strength is a model for all other empires. I ask that you show generosity towards those less fortunate.
I believe it's in our mutual interest to allow free passage between our two great empires.
Opening our borders to one another can only serve to solidify our friendship.
I would like to negotiate passage through your territory.

I would like to lay plans for establishing a Research Agreement with your great nation. Doing so would require each of us to spend 150 [ICON_GOLD]. What do you think?[NEWLINE][NEWLINE](Agreeing will not form a Research Agreement yet)
I feel that a Research Agreement is a mutually beneficial arrangement that would help serve to cement our Friendship.
This deal strengthened our nations and our bonds of friendship. Shall we renew this deal and continue our shared prosperity?
This deal has faded in our eyes over the years. To renew this deal, we would need more from your side of the negotiation.
Hey, I'd like to add that to my collection of luxuries. You think this is good enough? I'd throw in some cocaine too but the shipments coming late this time...
Your pathetic armies will never defeat me!
Well I guess we'll just have to melt down some churches or something to fight this war effectively...
What a fool you are to attack Paraguay!
You bring about your own demise you fool!
Haha. Well, I won't question your decision, but it appears to me that you've made a big mistake.
Your actions fill me with sadness... There is surely a special place in Hell for those such as you.
You would attack us in such a manner? Your hubris knows no limits. I hope that you will one day be judged for this.
Taking advantage of another's weakness is unnecessary in the pursuit of victory. Surely you know there's a better way?
How could you do such a thing? Begone, you vile being.
After all the orgies we were in together? How dare you betray an Eskimo cousin!
It is Paraguay's destiny to rule this earth! You are another stepping stone on the path to world domination.
Your land is rightfully Paraguayan. I will restore this mistake.
This world is destined to be mine. It is time for me to show you what that means. *Maniacal Laugh* *Maniacal Laugh* *Maniacal Laugh*
Fate has christened me the one which shall bring unity to this divided planet.
History shall surely smile on me once I've destroyed the likes of you and the rest of the vermin which surround me.
I'll be honest with you - I intend to destroy you along with everyone else.
You are merely a stepping-stone on my grand ascent to world domination.
Now is the time for my master plan to commence. It is time for you to die like the rest of these fools.
The advantage is mine. I will now destroy you.
I have waited long enough. I have seen an opening in your defense and I will use it to my advantage.
I have been waiting a long time for this day. Now would be a good time to put your affairs in order.
It is now my time. I will defeat you and come one step closer to victory.
Fate is not on your side. Crossing my path with such weakness is a mistake you will not long regret.
The current situation cannot be ignored. It is now or never.
I cannot ignore this chance to eliminate a potential competitor.
Your weakness presents to me a great opportunity. You have my apologies.
Although the task before me may be impossible, I am compelled to find a way to destroy you and all that you stand for. I will do so or die trying.
It is clear that you are strong. I will, however, find a way to defeat you.
You are a villain without equal. Within every fiber of my being, I know I must destroy you.
Your might is unmatched, but I will find a way to defeat you.
The time to make a stand is now. The odds are not with me, but I find a way to destroy you.
Your incredible strength will not deter me from finding a way to defeat you. May the fates smile on me.
Although I do not wish it, I fear that now may be my only opportunity to defeat you. Let us meet on the battlefield.
Destruction might be the fate which awaits me, but should I back down only eventual defeat awaits anyways.
Although feigning friendship with you wasn't very polite, few who make their mark on history were known for their manners. May your passage be swift.
Your weakness is my opportunity. Placing any trust in me was a mistake.
Backstab is such an ugly word. Shall we instead say I am just "reinterpreting" our supposed friendship?
I have to admit, I never really liked you much. Pretending to do so was getting old anyways. But enough with the small talk, it's time for you to die.
The odds are clearly not with me, but I see no alternative to revealing my deceptive practices. I can now only pray that my armies succeed.
So be it. My armies will extract it from your lands then.
Then war it is.
What is your offer?
What would you suggest?
What is the price of peace?
There can be no peace. Perhaps another day.
This is not the time for negotiation.
We still have business to settle.
Not until you have joined this nation of mine.
Excellent.
I am grateful that this has ended without violence.
I am pleased to hear this.
That is good to hear.
You have my thanks.
I am grateful that this has ended without violence.
History will long remember your great deeds.
That is a shame.
Perhaps another time then.
That is disappointing.
So be it.
Then you will be responsible for the consequences.
You will regret this.
For freeing those captives, you have my thanks.
I am appreciative for the actions you have taken on behalf of my people.
Thank you. May this be remembered as a historic event which brought our two great empires closer together.
How dare you? Know that there will be consequences for this.
If you are trying to provoke a war, you're doing a fine job.
Well, at least you're honest. But that may be your only good trait.
A likely story.
That is what I was afraid of.
I only hope that is indeed the case.
We'll see about that.
Yes, that's right.
I remain confident that my decision was the best for my people and my nation.
It seems that you cannot be reasoned with. What a shame.
I wish you had more carefully considered your response.
I don't appreciate that tone that you're using with me.
You know that this can only sow tension between our two nations.
I thought you might like to know that I've launched an invasion of one of your little pet states. The lands of {@1_MinorCivName} will make a fine addition to my own.
Oops, it seems I've attacked your little friend {@1_MinorCivName}. Care to do something about it?

It's come to my attention that I may have attacked {@1_MinorCivName}, a city-state under your protection. While it was not my goal to be at odds with your empire, this was deemed a necessary course of action.
I've been informed that my empire has commenced an attack on {@1_MinorCivName}. I assure you, this was not on purpose, and hope that this does not serve to drive us apart.
We should consider exchanging embassies, which would allow for more advanced diplomacy between our peoples.
We would like to set up an embassy in your capital. What do you think?
Your bullying of {@1_MinorCivName} is intolerable. I demand that you refrain from squeezing tribute out of city-states under my protection.
I heard about what you did to {@1_MinorCivName}. Did you not realize they are under my protection? Do not provoke me further.
We asked {@1_MinorCivName} for a tribute recently and they gave in. You promised to protect them from such things, but we both know you cannot back that up.
Your little friend {@1_MinorCivName} is so easy to push around. They gave in to our tribute demands, and I don't believe you are in a position to do anything about it.
It's come to my attention that I may have bullied {@1_MinorCivName}, which is under your protection. You do not put their needs above mine, I hope.

I've been informed that my armies have taken tribute from {@1_MinorCivName}, a city-state under your protection. I assure you, this was quite unintentional, and I hope that this does not serve to drive us apart.

Warm salutations to you wise leader! I'm pleased to see you also have chosen to follow the path of Freedom. The free world will be stronger with one more nation to help us all fight against oppression!
Greetings comrade! I'm pleased to see you also have chosen to follow the path of Order. Perhaps we can find some opportunities to aid each other during our empires' next 5-Year Plans!
Welcome great emperor! I'm pleased to see you have also chosen to follow the path of Autocracy. May we work together to ensure that only the very strongest nations survive to achieve true greatness!
How did one of your filthy agents somehow steal one of our basic technological secrets? These may be the last words we speak in peace.
I am willing to overlook your recent theft of one of my technological secrets with a solemn promise that it won't happen again.
I'm glad you agreed to stop this petty thieving.
Your indiscretion is not a surprise.
As you request, our agents will not conduct operations in your territory.
Our agents help keep our civilization safe from all threats, including you. They operate as we need them to, not as you ask.
Thank you for bringing this {@1_CivAdjective} plot to our attention. With this warning, we will be ready for whatever they may try. Your generous aid will be remembered.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} is plotting against you. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with us.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} is currently marching an army to sneak attack your city of {2_CityName}. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with us.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} is currently marching an army your way in a sneak attack. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with us.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} embarked an army with naval escorts to sneak attack your city of {2_CityName}. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with us.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} embarked an army with naval escorts in a sneak attack against your civilization. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with us.
We killed your spy as it was trying to steal from us. From my experience, it is far less dangerous to read a book and try to learn something yourself.
I regret any confusion caused by our late agent's recent activity. Please let any hostile feelings rest with the deceased operative.
Hello there. Are you here about that little spying incident?
One of my cities was recently burglarized and technological secrets were stolen. May I be assured that you had nothing to do with this?
I'm convinced you've been spying on my great civilization. You should stop before somebody gets hurt.
We have taken notice of the religious conversions you are undertaking inside our empire. We must ask you to cease this activity immediately!
I understand that some actions may not be forgiven.
It makes me glad that you will overlook this awkward circumstance.
I'm glad you agreed to end this proselytizing.
Your religious fervor is unsettling.
As you wish, our missionaries will no longer share the one true faith with the people in your cities.
In spite of your protests, your citizens will continue to be enlightened by our missionaries, even though you damn your own people to live in ignorance.
We are eagerly anticipating your unconditional surrender.
Your complete capitulation sounds reasonable.
We can make a deal now to forestall your utter annihilation.
We were very pleased to hear your recent proposal to the {1_LeagueName}. It seems that our goals are aligned.
Your proposal to the {1_LeagueName} suits our interests quite nicely. You have our sincere gratitude.
Your proposal to the {1_LeagueName} is a blatant attack on our interests. I hope this does not escalate to future conflict.
I found your proposal to the {1_LeagueName} very troubling. Surely there is a better way to resolve our differences than petty politics.
Thanks to the help of your delegates, our recent proposal to the {1_LeagueName} was successful. We look forward to your continued support, and will try to return the favor.
Our proposal to the {1_LeagueName} succeeded, with the support of your delegation. Together we can accomplish many great things.
Your delegation played a part in the failure of our proposal to the {1_LeagueName}. I do not take such transgressions lightly.
Our proposal to the {1_LeagueName} was defeated at the hands of your delegates. Do not expect our delegation to support your interests in the future.
We thank you for entrusting the World Congress to our capable leadership. I expect great things to come in the {1_LeagueName}.
We'll see about that.
Yes, that's right.
I remain confident that my decision was the best for my people and my nation.
Very well. I'll be monitoring the situation.
We are not willing to offer you enough to make this a fair trade.
Any deal we suggest would result in an unfair exchange for you.
We've noticed that you've been looking for cultural artifacts within our borders. This needs to stop.
Sorry, our plans are too important to be stopped over a trinket.
As you wish, we will stop looking for artifacts within your borders.
Do I have to escalate this?
Thank you for heeding our request. An artifact discovered on our land belongs to our people, not yours.
I'll dig wherever I want.
We meant no offense when attempting to steal your cultural heritage.
The people of my nation have been corrupted by your bourgeois messages of liberty and equality. They seem to believe they have the right to demonstrate in the streets!
Your ideological plotting has us scared of a revolution for Order in our land. Will these workers' strikes never end?
Your message of strength through supreme power has resonated with our people. Must we imitate your feared totalitarian state?
Your citizens clamor for human liberties. Tear down this wall of oppression and join the cause of Freedom and progress!
The oppressed workers of your land are unhappy. Whether you like it or not, history is on our side. We will bury you!
Your restless people are in need of strong leadership. Join us in writing history instead of sitting there with your hands folded.
Hey, another person joining Club Freedom! How wonderful! Maybe I can pass by the casino in your capital now.
Give us the child for eight years and it will be a socialist forever. Your working class have heard this truth; now we welcome them to our revolutionary struggle for Order.
You have done well to choose the path of Autocracy. The whims of Freedom and Order are but a modern invention, but Autocracy - that is written in nature's code.
Isn't it such a great thing that your people are coming over so often for the parties at my place? Stop by if you get a chance! It's fascinating to see poor people in action!
